appEmptyDescription:

appItemDeleteConfirmModalDescription:
Are you sure to delete the application?
This action may effect routines that use this application.
uploadAppDescriptionHintText:
You can upload an application by dragging it here or clicking on the button.

Only .apk .ipa files are supported.
